metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8172 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
TLS session reuse can lead to host certificate verification bypass in node version < 12.18.0 and < 14.4.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode72 - 12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3
nodejs - 12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3').
